description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT . The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of quantity [INTENT][:quantity_number | Capitalize] Rubber Track System. The full description of the requirement can be found under Annex A "Statement of Requirement" in the Request for Prosposal (RFP). Mandatory language section for Industry Day attendees: ( other reasons given here)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Notice Number
* **Number:** wp-665-73627008
* **Amendment Number**: 0

## Solicitation Number
* **Number:** W8485-258485/A

## Tender Details
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2024, 14:00:00 
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 1, 2025
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025
* **Tender Status:** Open

## Contract Description
The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the supply of a Rubber Track System. The full description of the requirement can be found in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

## Solicitation Category
* **Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price only

## Trade Agreements
This solicitation is open to suppliers from Canada and participating countries under the following Trade Agreements:
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Regions of Opportunity
* **Region:** Worldwide

## Regions of Delivery
* **Region:** Province of Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
* **Location:** North Bay, Ontario
* **Location:** Canada

## Contracting Entity
* **Entity Name:** Department of National Defence
* **Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2

## Contact Information
* **Contact Name:** Fawaz Awan
* **Contact Email:** [Fawaz.Awan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Fawaz.Awan@forces.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone:** (819) 939-4285

## Documents
The Request for Proposal (RFP) document can be obtained from the Canadabuys website.
Documentation may be submitted
